Package de.ukbonn.mwtek.utilities.generic.time

Class DateTools

java.lang.Object
de.ukbonn.mwtek.utilities.generic.time.DateTools
public class DateTools extends Object
Auxiliary class, with various tools to convert / create date fields.

    • mergeToDateTime

      public static Date mergeToDateTime(Date date, Date time, Boolean nullifyMilliseconds)
      Merging a date and a time (necessary because of weird database design where date and time are )

      Care with using java.util.date to merge dates because its kinda bugged!

      Parameters:
      date - Date with date information
      time - Date with time information
      nullifyMilliseconds - Should the millisecond field be explicitly set to 0?
      Returns:
      A Date object, initialized with the passed (separated) date and the passed time.

      Parameters:

    • calcDiffBetweenDates

      public static double calcDiffBetweenDates(Date lowerDate, Date upperDate, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Calculation of time differences between two given dates
      Parameters:
      lowerDate - lower date
      upperDate - upper date
      timeUnit - desired output format (TimeUnit )of the time specification (e.g. seconds) (default: minutes)
      Returns:
      difference of the dates in the given timeUnit

    • calcYearsBetweenDates

      public static int calcYearsBetweenDates(Date lowerDate, Date upperDate)

    • calcMonthsBetweenDates

      public static int calcMonthsBetweenDates(Date lowerDate, Date upperDate)
      Calculates the number of full months between two dates. If the day of the end date is earlier than the day of the start date in the same month, one month is subtracted from the total difference.

      If the provided dates are in the same month and day, the result will be 0. If the end date is null, the current date will be used as the end date. The method ensures that lowerDate is always before upperDate by swapping them if needed.

      Parameters:
      lowerDate - the earlier date. Must not be null.
      upperDate - the later date. If null, the current date is used.
      Returns:
      the number of full months between the two dates.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the lowerDate is null.

    • getCurrentUnixTime

      public static long getCurrentUnixTime()
      Determining the current epoch second
      Returns:
      unix time in seconds

    • calcWholeDaysBetweenDates

      public static Long calcWholeDaysBetweenDates(Date lowerDate, Date upperDate)
      Calculates the whole number of calendar days between two dates.
      Parameters:
      lowerDate - the start date (inclusive) must not be null.
      upperDate - the end date (inclusive). If null, the current date is used.
      Returns:
      the number of whole calendar days between the two dates, or null if an error occurs.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the lowerDate is null.

    • calcLengthOfStayBetweenDates

      public static Long calcLengthOfStayBetweenDates(Date lowerDate, Date upperDate)
      Calculates the length of stay ("Verweildauer") in the hospital between two dates. This method includes the start and end dates in the calculation, thus adding one more day to the result. This adjustment handles the "fencepost" error ("Zaunpfahlfehler") in time intervals.
      Parameters:
      lowerDate - the start date of the hospital stay
      upperDate - the end date of the hospital stay
      Returns:
      the length of stay in days

    • secondsToDay

      public static double secondsToDay(long seconds, Boolean decimalPlaces)

    • isSameCalendarDay

      public static boolean isSameCalendarDay(Date date1, Date date2)

    • isMoreThanOneDayOlder

      public static boolean isMoreThanOneDayOlder(Date youngerDate, Date olderDate)
      Determines whether the difference between two dates is more than one day.
      Parameters:
      youngerDate - The date that is younger than the other date
      olderDate - The date that is older than the other date
      Returns:
      true if the difference between the two dates is more than one day, false otherwise

    • isMoreThanXDaysOlder

      public static boolean isMoreThanXDaysOlder(Date youngerDate, Date olderDate, int daysDifference)
      Determines whether the difference between two dates is more than a given amount of day(s).
      Parameters:
      youngerDate - The date that is younger than the other date
      olderDate - The date that is older than the other date
      daysDifference - The number of days that should be at least between the two dates
      Returns:
      true if the difference between the two dates is more than one day, false otherwise

    • toDate

      public static Date toDate(int year, int month, int day)
      Converts year, month, and day into a Date object with GMT time zone.

    • isWithinPeriod

      public static boolean isWithinPeriod(Date target, org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Period period)
      Checks whether a given Date is within the specified Period, including the start and end dates.

      This method ensures that the target date is:

      • On or after the start date
      • On or before the end date

      If the period or any required values are missing, the method returns false.

      Parameters:
      target - The Date to check.
      period - The Period within which the target date should fall.
      Returns:
      true if the target date is within the period (inclusive), otherwise false.
